# plutonium-core [![Donate now][donate-now]][paypal-donations]

The core module of the PlutoniumOS

## Installation

```sh
$ npm i plutonium-core
```

## Example

```js
// Dependencies
var PlutoniumOS = require("plutonium-core");

// Get resolution
console.log(PlutoniumOS.Resolution.get());

```
